plot_physics¶

StaticMap.plot_physics()¶

Add physical features to the map.

Add each requested physical feature as defined in the attribute physical. Current supported features are: ‘rivers’ for river centerlines, ‘lakes’ to display lake areas, and ‘rivers_na’ and ‘lakes_na’ to display supplementary data for rivers and lakes in North America. Features are retrieved from the natural earth dataset http://www.naturalearthdata.com/.
